name: Soldier of Homeland: Browser
description:
Soldier Of The Homeland : Browser version is a free third person shooter set in a snowy environment.

 The story of the game is about an army soldier in a fictional country who defends his country against enemies invasion.

game features:

  1. Intense and exciting shooter gameplay
  2. Beautiful snowy environment
  3. Entertaining and simple story

Download windows version with higher graphics:

https://hammergamesb.itch.io/soldier-of-the-homeland-freedom-story
